channel.title: Comments on: Left to His Own Devices
channel.description: Scattered pages from an apocryphal diary

item.title: By: jenny
item.dc:creator: jenny
item.description: and you haven't posted rambo rabbit or "K" or "there is no black and white". and surely there's more artwork out there too. i'm betting there's even more poetry in the archives ;)
item.content:encoded: and you haven’t posted rambo rabbit or “K” or “there is no black and white”. and surely there’s more artwork out there too. i’m betting there’s even more poetry in the archives ðŸ˜‰

item.title: By: jenny
item.dc:creator: jenny
item.description: i thought you had a novel and a novellette too. and such. you're holdin' out on us dude.
item.content:encoded: i thought you had a novel and a novellette too. and such. you’re holdin’ out on us dude.

item.title: By: Drey
item.dc:creator: Drey
item.description: They *are* all published, right here on this blog.
item.content:encoded: They *are* all published, right here on this blog.

item.title: By: jenny
item.dc:creator: jenny
item.description: i'm still hoping every story,poem,novel and such that you ever wrote gets published, since it's all amazing.
item.content:encoded: i’m still hoping every story,poem,novel and such that you ever wrote gets published, since it’s all amazing.
